review: It's so hard to say why this game is so good without spoiling it....I guess the main thing I love about it is how well-crafted the story is. There are many layers and details to consider, and I feel like there would be more to think about with each further playthrough. I've only just finished it and my mind is still reeling a bit, going over everything, connecting all the pieces, and thinking a bit beyond the visible aspects of the game. Just...wow.

review: First playthrough will always be the most exciting and genuine playthrough, but I'm sure I'll be revisiting this game frequently anyway. It's...impressive. Play it.

Plot could've been better, but as an atmospheric horror/psychological thriller, it works. Most of the time it's your own paranoia frightening you...Then you start to relax, only to find yourself being chased by a maniac. Tried to play it a second time, when the achievements became available, but somehow it's even worse when you know what's coming...
Stopped playing 'cos I nearly ♥♥♥♥ my pants. May attempt it again one day.
